document_data.name: Owen
document_data.mainbody: '''Owen''' was a young [[adventurer]] inhabiting the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Owen had green hair thanks to a [[magic]]al alteration made to him by an enchanted necklace.
document_data.Possessions: Owen carried around a [[bardiche]], a [[dagger]], a [[tent]], and a set of [[scale mail]].
document_data.Activities: He joined a group of adventurers called the [[Knights of the Sword Coast]] and was excited to earn riches.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Unbeknownst to Owen, the magical necklace that turned his hair green also gave him the astounding regenerative abilities of a [[troll]].
